query:
INSERT INTO accommodationRooms (eventId, name, capacity, roomType, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT e.id, 'Cottage', 4, 'suite', NOW(), NOW() FROM events e
WHERE e.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT eventId FROM accommodationRooms)
AND e.id = (SELECT id FROM events WHERE coupleName1 = 'Louis' LIMIT 1);

INSERT INTO accommodationRooms (eventId, name, capacity, roomType, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT e.id, 'Lodge', 6, 'suite', NOW(), NOW() FROM events e
WHERE e.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT eventId FROM accommodationRooms WHERE name = 'Lodge')
AND e.id = (SELECT id FROM events WHERE coupleName1 = 'Louis' LIMIT 1);

INSERT INTO accommodationRooms (eventId, name, capacity, roomType, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT e.id, CONCAT('Room ', ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY e.id)), 2, 'standard', NOW(), NOW() FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT e.id FROM events e
  WHERE e.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT eventId FROM accommodationRooms WHERE roomType = 'standard')
  AND e.id = (SELECT id FROM events WHERE coupleName1 = 'Louis' LIMIT 1)
) e
CROSS JOIN (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) nums;

SELECT e.id, CONCAT('Room ', ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY e.id)), 2, 'standard', NOW(), NOW() FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT e.id FROM events e

CROSS JOIN (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) nums;
